dataScience.name: Coursera - Data Science Specialization
dataScience.description: A comprehensive series of courses covering various aspects of data science, offered by Johns Hopkins University.

dataScience.name: DataCamp
dataScience.description: Offers a wide range of courses and hands-on coding exercises for data science and analytics.

dataScience.name: Kaggle
dataScience.description: Provides datasets, competitions, and a community for data scientists to learn and showcase their skills.

dataScience.name: edX - Data Science MicroMasters
dataScience.description: A series of graduate-level courses offered by various universities, covering core data science concepts.

dataScience.name: Fast.ai
dataScience.description: Offers practical deep learning courses for coders, focusing on neural networks and machine learning.

dataScience.name: Analytics Vidhya
dataScience.description: Provides articles, tutorials, and courses on various data science topics, as well as hackathons and job opportunities.

dataScience.name: MIT OpenCourseWare - Data Science and Statistics
dataScience.description: Offers various courses from MIT covering data science, statistics, and machine learning topics.

dataScience.name: DataQuest
dataScience.description: Provides hands-on coding experience and guided projects for learning data science skills.

dataScience.name: Towards Data Science
dataScience.description: A Medium publication featuring articles and tutorials on various data science topics written by practitioners and experts.

dataScience.name: Data Science at the Command Line
dataScience.description: A comprehensive guide to data science using command-line tools, covering data manipulation, exploration, and analysis.
